alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 10 at 9:45PM CDT until May 11 at 9:32PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge affecting Karnes and Goliad Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Flooding spreads across the wide flood plain upstream and downstream. No structures are threatened. Livestock and farm equipment will need to removed from the floodplain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 32.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 PM CDT Wednesday was 32.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 14.9 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 32.2 feet on 11/02/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat San Antonio River Hwy 72 nr Runge 27.0 32.6 Wed 9 pm CDT 22.6 18.8 16.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 945 AM CDT.
